name: jewfish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a name that is used for several different kinds of large fish that live in warm or tropical seas: In these waters you can expect to catch barracuda, yellowtail snapper, red hind, and jewfish.
Fotosearch/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThere were many large jewfish and barracuda hanging around the wreck.Black jewfish are vulnerable to overfishing because of their sedentary habits. In the winter months shoals of grouper and jewfish abound.
